# Tournament get endpoint addition (2026-01-08 02:08Z)

_**User (2026-01-08 10:17Z)**_

@src/core/states/tournaments/requests –¥–æ–±–∞–≤—å
 /v1/tournaments/get:
    get:
      description: Returns tournament by id
      operationId: Get tournament by id
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: query
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/TournamentInfoResponse'
        '400':
          description: 'Invalid value for: query parameter id'
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string
        '404':
          description: not found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/NotFound'
        '500':
          description: unknown
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Unknown'

TournamentInfoResponse:
      required:
      - id
      - name
      - status
      - date
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        name:
          type: string
        status:
          type: string
          enum:
          - RegistrationOpen
          - InProgress
          - Completed
        date:
          type: integer
          format: int64

- GET `/v1/tournaments/get` with query parameter `id`
- Returns `TournamentInfoResponse` on success
- Handles error cases: 400, 404, 500

The `TournamentInfoResponse` has:
- id (int64)
- name (string)
- status (enum: RegistrationOpen, InProgress, Completed)
- date (int64)

3. Use the same `securedFetch` pattern as in `getTournaments.ts`

+     method: "GET",
+     host: environment.apiUrl,
+     path: &#96;/v1/tournaments/get?id=${id}&#96;,

+     body: undefined,
+     mapping: {
+       success: (res) =&gt; res.toJson(),
+       400: () =&gt; null,
+       404: () =&gt; null,
+       500: () =&gt; null,
+       unknownError: () =&gt; null,
+     },
+   });
